item.title: 3Gun Show 371 – Using a Ballistic App for Long Range Success
item.description:
In today's show we’re going to be talking about setting yourself up for success in your long range rifle game by using a ballistic app.
In this context, by “long range” I mean 3-gun or action shooting long range with an intermediate cartridge, typically from an AR-15. Which is about 500-600 yards max. We're going to run through all the data you need to enter into a ballistic app to get your proper ballistic solution and where you should gather that data.

item.title: 3Gun Show 370 – Custom 2011 Pistol Options
item.description:
The week this podcast is published will mark the resurrection of Hard as Hell 3-Gun.
That got me thinking about the last time I shot hard as hell 3-Gun in December of 2018 and while I was in Saint George I was hosted by the wonderful people at Vortex Optics. WE had a house full of practical shooting enthusiasts and I was in the market to purchase a 2011 pistol so we fired up the microphones and discussed the key features that make for a good 2011 pistol.
The podcast that follows is the replay of that interview, a round table with friends of the show Josh Tarrant, Travis Vogel and Adam Maxwell. The information is still incredibly valuable today and I hope you enjoy it.

We continue the discussion in the After Show, available exclusively to Patreon supporters. Please support our sponsors US Law Shield, EMP Shield, Paul Burke - Idaho Realtor, Numanna Foods, Backwoods Home Magazine, Jared Savik - Montana Realtor, Lizzy McDaniel - Tennessee Realtor, Minutemen Coffee, and My Kind CBD. item.title: Prepping 2.0 205 – Prepper Parenting
item.description: In Episode 205, we have Bryan and Ben, a father and son, who talk about prepper parenting. Bryan focuses on how to raise ‘em right and Ben, who is in his early 20s, talks about how people his age view prepping (it might surprise you). We continue the discussion in the After Show, available exclusively to Patreon supporters. Please support our sponsors US Law Shield, EMP Shield, Paul Burk - Idaho Realtor, Numanna Foods, Backwoods Home Magazine, Jared Savik - Montana Realtor, Lizzy McDaniel - Tennessee Realtor, Minutemen Coffee, and My Kind CBD. We are now part of the Firearms Radio Network. Learn more about our podcast at Prepping 2-0.com.
